title: Crows Hill
description: The Dark Seeds is a multi-character driven novella series, set in our possible future, molded from the choices of today. The last glimmer of hope lies within a few extraordinary blood lines. Their courage is tested when they must fight for freedoms they've never known. Will their sacrifice be enough to wake our sleeping world before the darkness consumes humanity forever? Crows Hill is Adina's story, the first to be told. She was sold to the highest bidder, but unlike the others, she has every intention of escaping the asylum before Crows Hill devours her soul.
author: L.M. Fields
